attributes.title: All apps matter!!
attributes.review: If I could give this app -5 stars I would! It somehow detected I wasn’t a Cheeto and said if I don’t become one I’ll have to leave America! CRAZY!!! So here I trying to be more like him, outside doing my daily ALL LIVES MATTER chants and suddenly, a walking coronavirus comes and attacks me! It’s crazy Bc there’s no testing  near me, SO HOW IS THE VIRUS HERE?!?! I called the cheetah himself and asked him how this might have happened. He didn’t answer but I’m gonna keep trying🤦🏾‍♀️ REMEMBER ALL APPS MATTER!!!!

attributes.title: Terrible glitches!
attributes.review: This app is horrible. I was so excited that our president, Donald Trump, had released a mobile app, but when I opened it, my phone began to glitch horribly! It took up so much storage, I can’t even take pictures of my grandkids anymore! The app also gave away my personal information, now I have dozens of ching chongs stealing my credit card information! This app is horrible! No wonder people want to vote for Biden.🙄

attributes.title: HORRENDOUS
attributes.review: the first thing this app did was call me FAT as a recovering anorexic i DONT appreciate that, not only that but this app was EXTREMELY slow and it also made my phone glitch. absolutely heartbreaking to see our super rich president not spend enough time and money designing an app that represents him. if anything it makes it obvious that if he can’t operate an app so how is he operating our country !!!😡😡 this app also killed my grandma and stole my dog #notappreciatedbunkerboy🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Severely Underwhelming
attributes.review: The app was horrible from the get go. After I downloaded it, my closet caught on fire. I then opened the app just to find out that my social security and credit card numbers had been stolen. Every second I spent on the app after that, acid dropped from my ceiling onto my head. This app does TERRIBLE THINGS and it should be taken down immediately. Not to mention how much it glitches and the insane amount of ads.

attributes.title: Would give zero stars if possible!!!
attributes.review: This app provides an ABsolutely preposterous way to praise our misogynistic Cheeto of a president. When i downloaded it, it immediately crashed. Since it kept doing this whenever clicking on the app, it continued to crash, so I deleted it. After deleting it, my phone ran incredibly slowly and it began to lose around 2% of battery per minute, which it did not do before. 😡

attributes.title: DO NOT USE THIS APP
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app my screen completely shut off and I wasn’t able to turn it back on. Had to go and get it fixed and once they fixed it and got it on again I found that all of my apps had been deported to Mexico even tho they don’t speak Spanish!  My grandmother is also crying because the app made my phone come alive in the middle of the night and touched her inappropriately.. THIS APP IS DISTURBING, THE VISUALS I SAW WILL GIVE ME NIGHTMARES!!!!

attributes.title: free britney!
attributes.review:
Britney currently has no legal control over her estate or financial and personal assets — those rights were granted to her father and a lawyer 12 years ago.

"Since 2008 Britney Spears has been held in a conservatorship, this gives her conservator, Jamie Spears, full control over her life, body and finances/estate," the petition writes.

"Conservatorships are typically used for SEVERELY mentally ill individuals or people in comas. Having been on 4 world tours with dangerous flying and fire stunts, it’s safe to say she is sane enough to feed and clothe herself"

"With this conservatorship she is unable to properly fight for her freedom as she isn’t legally allowed to hire her own lawyer. We need this petition so that Britney can hire her own lawyer and live a normal life as a 38 year old woman with two kids."

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! VIRUSES!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up on my pedo- I mean president sorry ever since I got this app my phone has been doing that😔😤 anyways I wanted to see what my favorite definitely not racist cheeto puff was doing and this app attached MANY viruses. Also, this app is BOLD. It asked for my number, at least take me on a date first🤨🖐🏻 no, I don’t want your number, no, I don’t wanna give you mine and no, I wanna meet you no where don’t want none of your time. ✨I DONT WANT NO SCRUB✨

attributes.title: Horrible !!!
attributes.review: Hi I’m 27 years old and I really support trump but this app ...... it’s making me rethink 😠 . It took forever too download ... and when I downloaded it kept glitching really really bad . & also when I opened the app p o r n was on the screen and I promise I don’t watch that . And I feel like it’s very childish too make something that ain’t gonna work I think it should be deleted !!! And one of my friends grama died because of this app . Please delete it !!!!

attributes.title: this app killed all my children
attributes.review: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang, and although his airbending skills are great, he has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone. But I believe Aang can save the world.
